content.title: Vievlog-Yifunde kwi-Intanethi Iikhosi ze-IT kunye neemviwo
content.startLearningNow: Qala ngokufunda kwaye ulungiselele uviwo lwe-pustik
content.learnIT: Ukufikelela kwimilinganiselo ephezulu kunezifundo, ii tutorials, kunye nezixhobo ezivela kubahlohli beengcali ngaphandle kwendleko.
content.learnFromExperts: Funda kwizithethi zemveli kunye neengcali ezinamava.
content.anytimeAnywhere: Yifunde nangaliphi na ixesha, naphi na
content.learnAtYourOwnPace: Yifunde ngokwakho isantya sokufikelela esingenamkhawulo kuzo zonke izifundo.
content.coverAllAspects: Iikhosi ezibandakanya isiseko kwiziseko eziphezulu, kubandakanya igrama, isigama, kunye nokuncokola.
content.viewAllIT: Jonga zonke iimvavanyo ze-vievlod i-IT kunye nezifundo

testimonial2.quote: Ukufunda i-vievlog kungazange kube lula kwaye kunokonwaba ngakumbi!
testimonial2.name: Tran hai nam

testimonial3.quote: Enkosi kwi-vievlog, ndiphucule ubuchule bam kakhulu.
testimonial3.name: Leh huong

content.yourOneStopShop: Iqonga lakho lokumisa elinye lokuphucula izakhono kunye neemviwo ze-pustik. Fikelela izixhobo zokufunda ezikhululekileyo kwaye ufikelelelwimi lwakho kunye neenjongo namhlanje!

metadata.lesson: Bhrawuza izifundo zethu zakudala zasimahla kwaye ufumane ikhosi egqibeleleyo yenqanaba lezakhono zakho.
metadata.grammar: Jonga imizobo yethu eneenkcukacha kunye nee-tutorials.
